name: connectty
description: SSH client with desktop and web interfaces, featuring credential management and AD authentication

scripts.dist:win: npm run generate-icons && npm run build -w @connectty/shared && npm run dist:win -w @connectty/desktop
scripts.dist:linux: npm run generate-icons && npm run build -w @connectty/shared && npm run dist:linux -w @connectty/desktop
scripts.dist:web: npm run build -w @connectty/shared && npm run build -w @connectty/server && npm run build -w @connectty/web
scripts.git:pull: git checkout package.json package-lock.json packages/*/package.json && git pull
